Marketing Data¶

These endpoints are public. Username and password are not required. You can use them to retrieve current market data such as price, last trade, etc.

Depth Table¶

Full market depth

Usage:

c.xdepth()

Output:

{'Asks': [[6.5, 9.0],
  [6, 19.5],
  [5.5, 5.0],
  [5.4, 17.95838012],
  [5.3, 2.0],
  [5.25, 2.0],
  [5.24, 2.0],
  [5.23, 2.0],
  [5.22, 2.0],
  [5.2, 16.33884797],
  [5.17, 128.98382722],
  [5.16, 8.71]],
 'Bids': [[5.13, 51.96],
  [5.12, 54.33980295],
  [5.11, 205.0],
  [5.1, 6.57211378],
  [5.07, 1.5],
  [5.06, 2.0],
  [5.03, 2.0],
  [5, 2.3],
  [4.91, 3.0],
  [4.9, 24.7],
  [4.81, 22.63227921],
  [4.77, 14.5947811],
  [4.76, 10.0],
  [4.75, 10.41848778],
  [4.74, 1.0],
  [4.5, 30.0],
  [3, 83.0]]}

Market Ticker¶

Get the best ask, best bid, and last trade

Usage:

c.xticker()

Output:

{'Best Ask': '5.17', 'Best Bid': '5.13', 'Last Trade': '5.13'}
